product_description: Organic Brown Rice Flour; 25 lb. bulk bags  Organic Brown Rice Flour ( UPC # 073416 00500 6) were distributed in retail store bulk bins.  Salmonella, an organism which can cause serious and sometimes fatal infections in young children, frail or elderly people, and others with weakened immune systems if consumed raw. Healthy persons infected with Salmonella often experience fever, diarrhea (which may be bloody), nausea, vomiting and abdominal pain.
reason_for_recall: Customer notified Lundberg Family Farms of a positive Salmonella test on Organic Brown Rice Flour.
